statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT review_text, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_id, customer_name FROM customer_reviews WHERE blockchain_reference IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT review_id, customer_name, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating < 3 AND blockchain_reference IS NOT NULL
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%great%' OR review_text LIKE '%excellent%'
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating = (SELECT MAX(rating) FROM customer_reviews)
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_name, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT review_id, customer_name, product_id FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT review_id, rating FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_name, rating, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4.5 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, rating, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating < 3.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_id, rating FROM customer_reviews WHERE product_id = 100 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;

SELECT cr.customer_name, cr.rating, bd.block_hash, bd.timestamp FROM customer_reviews cr JOIN blockchain_data bd ON cr.review_id = bd.review_id WHERE bd.timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY bd.timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Reviews;
SELECT customer_id, review FROM Reviews WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM Reviews GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM Reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM Customers WHERE registration_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT review, rating FROM Reviews WHERE customer_id = 101 AND product_id = 201 LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Reviews WHERE review LIKE '%great%' OR review LIKE '%amazing%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, hash, timestamp FROM blockchain WHERE block_number <= 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name ILIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating, review_date FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = '3e4b8b85-4e81-4fed-81ce-8d88346b37bc';
SELECT transaction_id, block_number, timestamp FROM blockchain WHERE block_number > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews;
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM Products;
SELECT customer_name, email, address, phone_number FROM Customers;
SELECT review_id, rating, review_text FROM CustomerReviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT block_id, hash_value, timestamp, transaction_id, previous_block_id FROM Blockchain;
SELECT * FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM Customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerReviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
